roleset.name: to attack or challenge in argument

example.name: transitive
example.text: As a result , says [0] [*T*-2] Mr. Geiger , lawyers think twice before [*-3] appealing a judge 's ruling , are reluctant [*-3] to mount [*RNR*-1] , or even support [*RNR*-1] , challenges against him for re-election and are usually loath [*-3] to file complaints that [*T*-163] might impugn a judge 's integrity .
